## extractParameterInfo() function

> This API is provided as an alpha preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Extracts parameter information from a TypeScript signature.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function extractParameterInfo(sig: ts.Signature, checker: ts.TypeChecker, tsModule: typeof ts): ParameterInfo[];
```
